name: HIDDEN (itch)
description:
A boy wakes up in his attic with no idea how he got there, or how he will get out.

This game was created for the past Asylum Jam in 2015.

I didn't have time to finish it, and it's been sitting in my projects folder for a while until I decided to get back to it.

As such, it's very short and minimalistic, but I hope you can enjoy the game anyway.
